<a id="XRHandTracker"></a>

# XRHandTracker

**Inherits:** [XRPositionalTracker](XRPositionalTracker.md) **\<** [XRTracker](XRTracker.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A tracked hand in XR.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A hand tracking system will create an instance of this object and add it to the [XRServer](XRServer.md). This tracking system will then obtain skeleton data, convert it to the Redot Humanoid hand skeleton and store this data on the **XRHandTracker** object.

Use [XRHandModifier3D](XRHandModifier3D.md) to animate a hand mesh using hand tracking data.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [XR documentation index](../tutorials/xr/index.md)

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_XRHandTracker_HandTrackingSource"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **HandTrackingSource**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_XRHandTracker_HandTrackingSource)

<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_UNKNOWN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandTrackingSource](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandTrackingSource) **HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_UNKNOWN** = `0`

The source of hand tracking data is unknown.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_UNOBSTRUCTED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandTrackingSource](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandTrackingSource) **HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_UNOBSTRUCTED** = `1`

The source of hand tracking data is unobstructed, meaning that an accurate method of hand tracking is used. These include optical hand tracking, data gloves, etc.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_CONTROLLER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandTrackingSource](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandTrackingSource) **HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_CONTROLLER** = `2`

The source of hand tracking data is a controller, meaning that joint positions are inferred from controller inputs.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_NOT_TRACKED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandTrackingSource](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandTrackingSource) **HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_NOT_TRACKED** = `3`

No hand tracking data is tracked, this either means the hand is obscured, the controller is turned off, or tracking is not supported for the current input type.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandTrackingSource](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandTrackingSource) **HAND_TRACKING_SOURCE_MAX** = `4`

Represents the size of the [HandTrackingSource](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandTrackingSource) enum.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

flags **HandJointFlags**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_XRHandTracker_HandJointFlags)

<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_JOINT_FLAG_ORIENTATION_VALID"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandJointFlags](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandJointFlags) **HAND_JOINT_FLAG_ORIENTATION_VALID** = `1`

The hand joint's orientation data is valid.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_JOINT_FLAG_ORIENTATION_TRACKED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandJointFlags](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandJointFlags) **HAND_JOINT_FLAG_ORIENTATION_TRACKED** = `2`

The hand joint's orientation is actively tracked. May not be set if tracking has been temporarily lost.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_JOINT_FLAG_POSITION_VALID"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandJointFlags](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandJointFlags) **HAND_JOINT_FLAG_POSITION_VALID** = `4`

The hand joint's position data is valid.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_JOINT_FLAG_POSITION_TRACKED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandJointFlags](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandJointFlags) **HAND_JOINT_FLAG_POSITION_TRACKED** = `8`

The hand joint's position is actively tracked. May not be set if tracking has been temporarily lost.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_JOINT_FLAG_LINEAR_VELOCITY_VALID"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandJointFlags](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandJointFlags) **HAND_JOINT_FLAG_LINEAR_VELOCITY_VALID** = `16`

The hand joint's linear velocity data is valid.<a id="XRHandTracker_constant_HAND_JOINT_FLAG_ANGULAR_VELOCITY_VALID"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[HandJointFlags](XRHandTracker.md#enum_XRHandTracker_HandJointFlags) **HAND_JOINT_FLAG_ANGULAR_VELOCITY_VALID** = `32`

The hand joint's angular velocity data is valid.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>
